00032 void init_all() {
00033     
00034     init_memory ();
00035     
00036     init_io();
00037     lcd_init(LCD_DISP_ON);
00038     init_menu();
00039         lcd_clrscr();
00040         lcd_puts(menu_current->text[0]);
00041     init_timer();
00042     //i2c_init(); /* for ADJD comunication. Not yet implemented */
00043     //  ss.col_sens_ADJD.ret = i2c_start(COL_SENS_ADJD_DEVICE_ADDRESS + I2C_WRITE);
00044     init_sensor_tcs();
00045     init_motors();  
00046 }
00047 
00051 void init_io() {
00052     
00053     /*
00054      *  sorry to say, the lcd is on the jtag pins
00055      */
00056     MCUCSR |= (1<<JTD); 
00057     MCUCSR |= (1<<JTD); /* disable the JTAG interface twice! */
00058 
00059     STEPPER_PORT &= ~((1 << REV_BIT_CLK) | (1<<REV_BIT_CW) | (1<<REV_BIT_EN) | (1<<CATCH_BIT_CLK) | (1<<CATCH_BIT_CW) | (1<<CATCH_BIT_EN));
00060     STEPPER_DDR |= (1 << REV_BIT_CLK) | (1<<REV_BIT_CW) | (1<<REV_BIT_EN) | (1<<CATCH_BIT_CLK) | (1<<CATCH_BIT_CW) | (1<<CATCH_BIT_EN);
00061     // STEPPER_PORT |= (1<<REV_BIT_CLK) | (1<<CATCH_BIT_CLK); /* The clock signal should be high by default */
00062 
00063     /* ADJD color sensor */
00064     COL_SENS_ADJD_LED_OFF;  /* LED by default of */
00065     COL_SENS_ADJD_LED_DDR |= (1<<COL_SENS_ADJD_LED_BIT);
00066     /* some of the inits is done in the i2cmaster library */
00067     
00068     /* the TCS color sensor */
00069     COL_SENS_TCS_OUT_PORT &= ~(
00070             (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_S0_BIT) | (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_S1_BIT) | 
00071             (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_S2_BIT) | (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_S3_BIT));
00072     COL_SENS_TCS_OUT_PORT |= (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_OE_BIT); /* active low */
00073     COL_SENS_TCS_OUT_DDR |= 
00074         (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_S0_BIT) | (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_S1_BIT) | 
00075         (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_S2_BIT) | (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_S3_BIT) |
00076         (1<<COL_SENS_TCS_OE_BIT);
00077 
00078     COL_SENS_TCS_IN_DDR &= ~(1<<COL_SENS_TCS_IN_ICP);
00079     
00080     /* interrupt on falling edge for TCS frequency measurement */
00081     MCUCR &= ~((1<<ISC00) | (1<<ISC01));
00082     MCUCR |= (1<<ISC01);
00083     
00084     /* rotatry encoder */
00085     ROTENC_INIT();
00086     
00087     /* get current rotary encoder position */
00088     if (IS_ROTENC_A)
00089         ss.rotenc.rottmp = ROTENC_A;
00090     if (IS_ROTENC_B)
00091         ss.rotenc.rottmp = ROTENC_B;
00092     if (IS_ROTENC_AB)
00093         ss.rotenc.rottmp = ROTENC_BOTH;
00094     if (IS_ROTENC_NONE)
00095         ss.rotenc.rottmp = ROTENC_NONE;
00096     
00097     /* lightbarrier */
00098     LB_DDR &= ~((1<<LB_BIT_CATCH) | (1<<LB_BIT_REV));
00099     
00100     /* Vibrator */
00101     VIBR_DDR |= (1<<VIBR_BIT);
00102 }
00103 
00107 void init_sensor_tcs() {
00108     COL_SENS_TCS_DISABLE;
00109     COL_SENS_TCS_SET_FREQ_SCALE(100);
00110 }
00111 
00123 void init_timer() {
00124     /* Output compare register */
00125     OCR0 = 250;
00126     
00127     /* Prescaler 64 */
00128     TCCR0 &= ~((1<<CS00) | (1<<CS01) | (1<<CS02));
00129     TCCR0 |= (1<<CS00) | (1<<CS01);
00130 
00131     /* CTC mode */
00132     TCCR0 &= ~((1<<WGM00) | (1<<WGM00));
00133     TCCR0 |= (1<<WGM01);
00134 
00135     /* enable compare match interrupt */
00136     TIMSK |= (1<<OCIE0);
00137 }
00138 
00142 void init_memory () {
00143     uint8_t x;
00144     
00145     /* init revolver */
00146     for (x=0; x<REV_MAX_SIZE; x++)
00147         ss.rev.smart[x].color = col_unknown;
00148 
00149     /* system speed */
00150     eeprom_read_block (&ss.speed, &ee_mem.speed, sizeof(ss.speed));
00151 
00152 #if DISTANCE_DETECTION | DISTANCE_NORM_DETECTION
00153     /* Refernce values for color detection */
00154     eeprom_read_block (col_ava_blu, ee_mem.usr_blu, sizeof(color_avarage));
00155     eeprom_read_block (col_ava_gre, ee_mem.usr_gre, sizeof(color_avarage));
00156     eeprom_read_block (col_ava_red, ee_mem.usr_red, sizeof(color_avarage));
00157 #endif  
00158 }

00163 void init_motors() {
00164     /***************** C A T C H E R **********************/
00165     
00166     ss.mot_catcher.status = stat_idle;
00167     ss.mot_catcher.status_last = stat_idle;
00168 
00169     ss.mot_catcher.enable = sys_catcher_enable;
00170     ss.mot_catcher.disable = sys_catcher_disable;
00171     ss.mot_catcher.move_step = sys_catcher_move_step;
00172     ss.mot_catcher.lb = &ss.lb_catcher;
00173     ss.mot_catcher.lb->is_blocked = sys_catcher_is_lb_blocked;
00174     
00175     ss.mot_catcher.max_size = CATCH_MAX_SIZE;
00176     ss.mot_catcher.step_duration = CATCH_STEP_DURATION;
00177     ss.mot_catcher.steps_estimated = CATCH_STEPS_ESTIMATED;
00178     ss.mot_catcher.steps_estim_def = CATCH_STEPS_ESTIMATED;
00179     ss.mot_catcher.ramp_duration = CATCH_RAMP_DURATION;
00180     ss.mot_catcher.pause_duration = ss.speed;
00181 
00182     
00183     CATCH_SET_CW;
00184     CATCH_ENABLE;
00185     
00186     /* find the next defined position */
00187     if (!IS_LB_CATCHER)
00188         catcher_rotate_relative(1);
00189 
00190     ss.mot_catcher.current_pos = 0;
00191     
00192     
00193     /*************** R E V O L V E R *********************/
00194 
00195     ss.mot_revolver.status = stat_idle;
00196     ss.mot_revolver.status_last = stat_idle;
00197     
00198     ss.mot_revolver.enable = sys_revolver_enable;
00199     ss.mot_revolver.disable = sys_revolver_disable;
00200     ss.mot_revolver.move_step = sys_revolver_move_step;
00201     ss.mot_revolver.lb = &ss.lb_revolver;
00202     ss.mot_revolver.lb->is_blocked = sys_revolver_is_lb_blocked;
00203     
00204     ss.mot_revolver.max_size = REV_MAX_SIZE;
00205     ss.mot_revolver.step_duration = REV_STEP_DURATION;
00206     ss.mot_revolver.steps_estimated = REV_STEPS_ESTIMATED;
00207     ss.mot_revolver.steps_estim_def = REV_STEPS_ESTIMATED;
00208     ss.mot_revolver.ramp_duration = REV_RAMP_DURATION;
00209     ss.mot_revolver.pause_duration = ss.speed;
00210         
00211     REV_SET_CCW;
00212     REV_ENABLE;
00213     ss.mot_revolver.current_pos = 0;
00214     ss.lb_revolver.passes = 0;
00215 
00216     /* find the next defined position */
00217     if (!IS_LB_REVOLVER)
00218         revolver_rotate_relative(1); 
00219 
00220 }

00240     men_running.text[1] = MEN_SUBTIT_RUNNING;
